name: Sink'em
description:
"I don't know how but our cannon balls can bounces off rocks. Hooray technology ...... I guess?" -Captain of battleship #1

A simple small 1v1 game where two battleships take turns to take a shot and then reposition. 

Simple mechanics. But in order to win, not only do you need to calculate the ricochet of the cannon balls, you also need to think about the possible strategies resulted from the different subweapons combined with different objects in different maps.

Explore the possibilities and have fun!

Made by:

Sarin Iamsangtham

Haotian Shen

With help from:
